metadata.title: CVE-2022-28487 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Tcpreplay version 4.4.1 contains a memory leakage flaw infix_ipv6_checksums() function. The highest threat from this vulnerabilityis to data confidentiality.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-28487` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tcpreplay - 4.2.6-1ubuntu0.1~esm4
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: tcpreplay package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.2.6-1ubuntu0.1~esm4').
